data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: In compliance with Regulation 30(6) read with Para A(15)(b) of Part A of Schedule III and other applicable provisions of the SEBI Listing Regulations, please find enclosed the transcript of the Q4 & FY23 earnings call of the Company held on 25 April 2023. The transcript includes list of management attendees and the dialogues including but not limited to the presentation, the Q&As', and is also uploaded on the website of the Company. No Unpublished Price Sensitive Information was shared/discussed by the Company during the earnings conference call. Detailed disclosure in this regard is attached.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body: In compliance with Regulation 30(6) read with Para A(15) of Part A of Schedule III and other applicable provisions of the SEBI Listing Regulations, we hereby inform you that the Company has today viz. Tuesday, 25 April 2023, concluded its earnings conference call with several Analysts/Institutional Investors/Funds on the Annual Audited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and financial year ended 31 March 2023 (Financial Results). Mr. Rampraveen Swaminathan, Managing Director & CEO represented the Company at the said earnings conference call. The Analysts/Institutional Investors/Funds were briefed on the published Financial Results, overall performance of the businesses of the Company and general industry update, followed by a Question & Answer session with the participants. The Earnings Presentation, which was sent to the Stock Exchanges vide our letter dated 24 April 2023 and uploaded on the Company website was referred during the call. The audio recording of the earnings conference call is uploaded on the website of the Company. No Unpublished Price Sensitive Information was shared/discussed by the Company during the earnings conference call. Detailed disclosure in this regards is attached.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: In compliance with Regulation 30 read with Para 15(a) of Part A of Schedule III and other applicable provisions of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulation, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the Earnings Presentation inter-alia, encompassing an overview of the Company, its operations and the Annual Audited Financial Results for the quarter and financial year ended 31 March 2023.

data.caption: Annual Audited Financial Results For Year Ended 31 March 2023
data.news_body: In compliance with Regulation 30 read with para A(4)(h) of Part A of Schedule III, Regulation 33 and other applicable provisions of the SEBI Listing Regulations, we hereby inform you that the Board of Directors of Mahindra Logistics Limited, at their Meeting held today viz. Monday, 24 April 2023, has inter-alia, approved the Annual Audited Consolidated and Standalone Financial Results of the Company for the financial year ended 31 March 2023. Pursuant to Regulation 33(3)(d) of the SEBI Listing Regulations, the Company hereby confirms and declares that the Statutory Auditor of the Company - Deloitte Haskins & Sells LLP, have issued their Audit Reports on the Annual Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the financial year ended 31 March 2023 with an unmodified opinion. Detailed disclosure, results and audit report is attached

data.news_body: In compliance with Regulation 30(6) read with Para A(15)(b) of Part A of Schedule III and other applicable provisions of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed the transcript of the Q3 & 9M FY23 earnings call of the Company held on Thursday, 2 February 2023.  The transcript includes list of management attendees and the dialogues including but not limited to the presentation, the Q&As', any assents /dissents and open points and is also uploaded on the website of the Company. No Unpublished Price Sensitive Information was shared/discussed by the Company during the earnings conference call. Detailed disclosure in this regard is attached.

Mr. Rampraveen Swaminathan, Managing Director & CEO and Mr. Yogesh Patel, Chief Financial Officer represented the Company at the said earnings conference call. The Analysts/Institutional Investors/Funds were briefed on the published Financial Results, overall performance of the businesses of the Company and general industry update, followed by a Question & Answer session with the participants. Outcome and audio recording of the said call along with detailed disclosure in this regard is attached.
